resources.string: Scheduled Time for the Launch has already passed\n
To set Launch Reminders Space Launches needs you grant the permission for the same. Kindly click allow and on the next Screen and enable Space Launches to Set Reminders
To show Notifications Space Launches needs you grant the permission for the same. Kindly click allow and on the next Screen enable Space Launches to Send Notifications
To use this feature You must allow Space Launches to display Notifications
